Title: Protesters halt activities at Ibadan Poly over renaming controversy
Summary: Academic and other activities at the main campus of The Polytechnic, Ibadan, were brought to a standstill yesterday . Students protested the renaming of the institution to Victor Omololu Olunloyo Polytechnics . Governor Seyi Makinde has renamed the institution .

Title: Afreximbank completes upsizing of reserve-based lending facility
Summary: African Export-Import Bank (Afreximbank) successfully completed upsizing its reserve-based lending facility in favour of Oando Oil Limited to US$375 million .

Title: Ondo govt’s quest to probe Akeredolu’s death sparks controversy
Summary: Stakeholders have expressed concerns over the move by the Ondo State Government to probe the cause of the death of former Governor Oluwarotimi Akeredolu .

Title: Lagos Assembly summons attorney-general, solicitor-general over local council law discrepancy
Summary: Lagos State House of Assembly summons the state's attorney-general, Lawal Pedro, and Solicitor-General, Hameed Olanrewaju, to appear before a joint committee . It follows a contentious letter from the Ministry of Justice regarding the commencement date of the Local Government Administration Law 2025 .

Title: HURIWA accuses lawmakers, MDAs of maltreating corps members
Summary: Human Rights Writers Association of Nigeria (HURIWA) raised allegations against the federal Ministries, Departments and Agencies (MDAs) and members of the National Assembly . HURIWA has raised allegations about what it described as a growing trend .

Title: Trump says Israel has agreed to 60-day ceasefire
Summary: Trump says Israel has agreed to the necessary conditions for a 60-day ceasefire in Gaza war . It is now up to Hamas to accept the deal, U.S. President Donald Trump said .

Title: Aiyedatiwa’s plan to probe Akeredolu’s death sparks uproar
Summary: As leaders warn against exhumation; describe move as divisive, unnecessary . Ondo State Government to initiate probe into circumstances surrounding death of former Governor Oluwarotimi Akeredolu has stirred a wave of controversy and condemnation across the state .

Title: 2027: ADC names Mark, Aregbesola, interim Chairman, Secretary
Summary: Former Senate President David Mark and former Osun State Governor Rauf Aregbesola appointed to interim leadership . The African Democratic Congress (ADC) has approved the appointment of several prominent political figures .

Title: Leadership Tenure in Nigeria: The Case for a Single Six-Year Term, by Afe Babalola
Summary: Afe Babalola: There is need to scrap the current two-term, eight-year system for Presidents and Governors . He argues that the current system should be replaced with a single, non-renewable six-year term .

Title: CSO fingers political enemies as Wike dismisses land scandal
Summary: The Centre for Democratic Integrity and Leadership has accused political enemies of orchestrating a smear campaign against the Minister of the Federal Capital Territory, Nyesom Wike . The group's position follows Wike’s latest denial of claims linking him to controversial land deals .

Title: INEC prepares new result review guide ahead of polls
Summary: The Independent National Electoral Commission is planning to issue a supplementary document to its 2022 Regulations and Guidelines, to clarify procedures for reviewing election results . The INEC Chairman, Prof Mahmood Yakubu disclosed this at the second quarterly consultative meeting with Resident Electoral Commissioners in Abuja on Tuesday .
